cheatsheet.title: Creating a new plot in Debrief

intro.description: This tutorial will lead you through creating a new, blank plot in Debrief.

item.title: Check your workspace
item.description: Debrief requires working files to be contained in a Workspace. [link to Workspace guidance in Help]
